original_title: Guns n' Roses: Sex N' Drugs N' Rock N' Roll
overview: Bursting out of the L.A. glam scene in the late 1980's, Guns N' Roses have gone on to epitomise everything that a rock band should be. Now, some 15 years later and with only one original member, they have somehow managed to retain an enormous army of de
title: Guns n' Roses: Sex N' Drugs N' Rock N' Roll
